SENT.plain: The aim of the present paper was to evaluate the validity of the Mini Mental State as a screening instrument for the diagnosis of dementia in comparison with the DSWM III R criteria for dementing syndromes
We conducted a case-control study of 335 person--89 had a diagnosis of primary progressive dementia, 76 had a diagnosis of vascular dementia
The data show that the Mini Mental State is useful clinical instrument for the preliminary screening for the diagnosis of dementia
